summary_md: North Macedonia, in the year 2024, has a GDP per capita of 6,701 USD per person (NY.GDP.PCAP.KD), with an inflation rate of 3.49% (FP.CPI.TOTL.ZG), and an unemployment rate of 13.42% (SL.UEM.TOTL.ZS). The average life expectancy is 75.32 years years (SP.DYN.LE00.IN), and internet usage stands at 87.20% (IT.NET.USER.ZS). The country's GDP from exports is 62.68% (NE.EXP.GNFS.ZS).
